text: Fatal toxicity of #chloroquine or #hydroxychloroquine with #metformin in 30-40% of mice,” in a study [preprint] using “allometric scaling” to ensure the dose given to a mouse is comparable to the dose a human would take. Caution for human use. #COVID19 https://t.co/Ch8szSfc7j https://t.co/4c2v64RHAf
